title: Is China Uninvestable?
description: Chinese equities go through a major period of upheaval as Beijing shifts its policy focus and intensifies its regulatory push. Victor Liu, senior research analyst at Causeway, joins Barron's Reshma Kapadia for a deep dive into the investment landscape for China.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Chinese equities go through a major period of upheaval as Beijing shifts its policy focus and intensifies its regulatory push. Victor Liu, senior research analyst at Causeway, joins Barron's Reshma Kapadia for a deep dive into the investment landscape for China.
